description: Project or thesis on a topic relevant to the School's research profile and the student's field of engineering study that allows students to apply their knowlege and skills to practical applications. Students commencing in sem 1 enrol in ENGG7807 for sem 1 and sem 2. Students commencing in sem 2 enrol in ENGG7808 for sem 2 and the following sem 1. Students completing course in single semester enrol in ENGG7806.
